title: What techniques and concepts are covered in the Quantum Psi(c) Hyperadvanced program?
first_phrase: This text is a summary of a four-day program called QUANTUM PSI / HYPERADVANCED, focused on introducing participants to techniques of decostruction to work on emotions, parallel to the more standard Yang approach in the course of presence. The text covers several concepts, including the theory of polarities and the postural triad, the principles of the two points technique, the use of mirrors, and the Polyvagal theory. The last part of the text describes the technique for Neuro-Emotional Release, which involves physical defusion with two points, touching the sternum, and using light and head rotation to activate different ways of seeing.

last_phrase: In conclusion, the neuro-emotional release (NER) technique offers various exercises to release emotional blockages and improve personal growth. The defusion exercise, coregulation and touch, and the use of light and head rotation are useful methods to achieve emotional release. Additionally, quantum coaching and the introduction of Clairvoyance and iPerpresenza can help with personal transformation and self-discovery. It is important to remember that practicing these techniques requires consistency and patience, but the benefits can be significant.
